Mode.name: ALT*
Mode.Description: Altitude Capture (ALT*) is an automatic mode that engages when the aircraft is approaching the selected altitude. It ensures a smooth transition from climb or descent to level flight.
Mode.Activation: Automatically activated when the aircraft enters the capture zone of the selected altitude.
Mode.Behavior: The aircraft reduces vertical speed to capture the selected altitude. Once the altitude is captured, the system transitions to ALT mode.
